channel.title: CVE Feed for nasa -- openmct
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nasa -- openmct

item.title: CVE-2022-23054|2024-08-03T03:28:43.268Z -- nasa -- openmct
item.description: Openmct versions 1.3.0 to 1.7.7 are vulnerable against stored XSS via the “Summary Widget” element, that allows the injection of malicious JavaScript into the ‘URL’ field. This issue affects: nasa openmct 1.7.7 version and prior versions; 1.3.0 version and later versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-22126|2024-08-03T03:07:48.263Z -- nasa -- openmct
item.description: Openmct versions 1.3.0 to 1.7.7 are vulnerable against stored XSS via the “Web Page” element, that allows the injection of malicious JavaScript into the ‘URL’ field. This issue affects: nasa openmct 1.7.7 version and prior versions; 1.3.0 version and later versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-23053|2024-08-03T03:28:43.252Z -- nasa -- openmct
item.description: Openmct versions 1.3.0 to 1.7.7 are vulnerable against stored XSS via the “Condition Widget” element, that allows the injection of malicious JavaScript into the ‘URL’ field. This issue affects: nasa openmct 1.7.7 version and prior versions; 1.3.0 version and later versions.
